  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccrg), wceq(cfv(cfv(c1, c2), c3), c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ce1, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cpl1, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cur, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cur, c4))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cfv(c1, c2), c3), c3, cfv(cfv(c1, cfv(cfv(cascl, c4), c3)), c3), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  fveq1d(cfv(c1, c2), c3, cfv(c1, cfv(cfv(cascl, c4), c3)), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  fveq2d(c1, c2, cfv(cfv(cascl, c4), c3), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  eqcomd(c2, cfv(cfv(cascl, c4), c3), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  syl(wcel(c0, ccrg), wceq(cfv(cfv(cascl, c4), c3), c2), wcel(c0, crg))
  ply1scl1(c0, cfv(cascl, c4), c3, c2, c4)
  simprd(wcel(c0, ccrg), wceq(cfv(cfv(c1, cfv(cfv(cascl, c4), c3)), c3), c3), wcel(cfv(cfv(cascl, c4), c3), cfv(cbs, c4)))
  evl1scad(cfv(cascl, c4), c3, cfv(cbs, c4), c1, c3, c0, c4, cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  eqid(cfv(cascl, c4))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c4))
  id(wcel(c0, ccrg))
  syl(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c3, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, crg))
  crngring(c0)
  ringidcl(c0, c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
}

thm evl1at1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CRing →((c1 ` c2)` c3)= c3)
  ⊣ c1 =(eval1 ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(Poly1 ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(1r ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(1r ` c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(((c1 ` c2)` c3), c3, ((c1 `((algSc ` c4)` c3))` c3), c0 ∈ CRing)
  fveq1d((c1 ` c2), c3, (c1 `((algSc ` c4)` c3)), c0 ∈ CRing)
  fveq2d(c1, c2, ((algSc ` c4)` c3), c0 ∈ CRing)
  eqcomd(c2, ((algSc ` c4)` c3), c0 ∈ CRing)
  syl(c0 ∈ CRing, ((algSc ` c4)` c3)= c2, c0 ∈ Ring)
  ply1scl1(c0, (algSc ` c4), c3, c2, c4)
  simprd(c0 ∈ CRing, ((c1 `((algSc ` c4)` c3))` c3)= c3, ((algSc ` c4)` c3)∈(Base ` c4))
  evl1scad((algSc ` c4), c3, (Base ` c4), c1, c3, c0, c4, (Base ` c0), c0 ∈ CRing)
  eqid((algSc ` c4))
  eqid((Base ` c4))
  id(c0 ∈ CRing)
  syl(c0 ∈ CRing, c3 ∈(Base ` c0), c0 ∈ Ring)
  crngring(c0)
  ringidcl(c0, c3, (Base ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
}
